title: When Mistakes Meet God's Grace
itunes:author: Guest: Mike Berry
itunes:summary:
No matter how hard you try, there are still moments you miss it as a parent. But when you do, God's grace can empower you to do better next time. John and Danny share some encouragement for moving on, even after you mess up. Featuring Mike Berry.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Mike Berry's book "Winning the Heart of Your Child" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-10-12?refcd=1284201

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/when-mistakes-meet-gods-grace/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
